body:
Adds documentation for the following [build systems](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_build_automation_software):

### Make-based

- [x] `MakefilePackage`

### Make-incompatible

- [x] `SConsPackage`
- [x] `WafPackage`

### Build-script generation

- [x] `AutotoolsPackage`
- [x] `CMakePackage`
- [x] `QMakePackage`

### Language-specific

- [x] `OctavePackage`
- [x] `PerlPackage`
- [x] `PythonPackage`
- [x] `RPackage`
- [ ] `RubyPackage` - waiting on #3127

### Other

- [ ] `AspellDictPackage` - not really a build system?
- [x] `CudaPackage` - not really a build system?
- [x] Custom build systems
- [ ] `IntelPackage` - waiting on #7469

We never really got around to documenting how to use each build system when we introduced separate base classes. This PR is an attempt to solve this. It is also an attempt to pass on knowledge of each build system to new package developers who may not be familiar with SCons or QMake or Waf. If there's anything you think I'm missing, let me know!

Closes #3228
Closes #2951
Closes #2222
title: Add documentation on build systems
